entry.title: Building production ready distributed task queue management system with celery
SUN vs Me: Quest to Outwit the Blinding Sun with MQTT and micropython
entry.summary:
Description

Vishrut Kohli, a Principal Engineer at battery Smart, shares his journey of battling the sun to optimize his sleep schedule. He discusses how he built an automated curtain system using micropython, MQTT, a VOS D1 mini, and a Raspberry Pi to control his blinds based on sunrise and sunset â€¦
entry.content:
Description

Vishrut Kohli, a Principal Engineer at battery Smart, shares his journey of battling the sun to optimize his sleep schedule. He discusses how he built an automated curtain system using micropython, MQTT, a VOS D1 mini, and a Raspberry Pi to control his blinds based on sunrise and sunset times.
